title: High Ping
body:
Anyone else experiencing high ping in the Pacific region?

The past few days I have been at a constant 75-80 ping with random ping spikes here and there. My internet connection seems to be normal without any spiking. My usual ping is 58 and I have asked some of my friends living in my area and they all seem to be facing the same problem as me.

replies.body: Mentioning that your friends living in the same area are having the same issues makes it sound like it might be somehow related to an ISP issue rather than something going wrong with the server traffic. Let's go ahead and do a quick check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is still in order there. Let me know if that helps, or if you're still having problems!

I'm from Oahu and I've been having constant high ping(about 130, usually 105)  and packet loss in I believe only in league, I've tried other games and everything seems to be normal.

edit: high ping for about 2-3 days

Fellow player from Hawaii (Maui) and I have also experienced this increase of ping to 130. I had a 112 and lower ping before and it was playable but 130+ is a making it hard. Another weird thing is my ping before would fluctuate a bit but now its a solid 130 all the time. Anyway I hope this gets worked out because there is now a noticeable delay between actions.

My ping went up the moment ranked went back up with maintenance, I had already opened a ticket beforehand that verified there was nothing wrong on my end despite my ping going up from 59 to 65-68 which sucks but is livable...it hasn't been below 70 since maint and when I immediately opened a ticket to say hey your maintenance made my ping increase all I got was the typical "restart your router and flush your dns" response when literally the ticket right before that already verified that it wasn't on my end (I had already done that shit before opening the ticket btw). Oh and I can't submit a reply to the ticket, either.

Like, I've been a devout player since forever but I'm getting really close to the point where I'm just gonna say fuck it and uninstall and that's saying a lot. This shit is really pissing me off especially considering there is nothing I can do to fix it since it's either you or the ISP's.  I have Frontier btw.

There have been posts from other people on the west coast about an increase in ping, and people ingame have mentioned it besides myself so clearly there is an issue that isn't limited to just me. 

I'll check up in a week, hopefully this is resolved by then.
having same prob tried all of troubleshooting that the support person told me and it didnt work it makes my game feel unplayable and is making me wanna quit league tbh
